languages.text: "Кей-морагх, мон-кай, это я сделаю трофей из твоей черепушки и буду гордо носить его на поясе, если ты не прикусишь язык!"

traits.locale_text: "Каэ-мораг, мон-кай, это я сделаю трофей из твоей черепушки и буду гордо носить его на поясе, если ты не прикусишь язык!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"
languages.original_text: "Кей-морагх, мон-кай, это я сделаю трофей из твоей черепушки и буду гордо носить его на поясе, если ты не прикусишь язык!"

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt, if you don't shut up!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt, if you don't shut up!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt, if you don't shut up!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt, if you don't shut up!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¡Kae-morag, mon-keigh! ¡Si cierras la boca, seré yo quien se haga un trofeo con tu calavera y lo colgaré orgullosamente de mi cinto!».
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Kae-morag, mon-keigh! ¡Si no te callas, seré yo quien se haga un trofeo con tu calavera y lo colgaré orgullosamente de mi cinto!».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “该死的猴子，如果你再不闭嘴，我就把你的头骨变成我的战利品，把它骄傲地挂在我的腰带上！”
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: “该死的猴子，如果你再不闭嘴，我就把你的头骨变成我的战利品，把它骄傲地挂在我的腰带上！”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Kae-morag, mon-keigh. Si vous ne vous taisez pas, c'est moi qui vais faire de votre crâne un trophée que je porterai fièrement à la ceinture ! »
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: « Kae-morag, mon-keigh. Si vous ne vous taisez pas, c'est moi qui vais faire de votre crâne un trophée que je porterai fièrement à la ceinture ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「カエ＝モラグ、モン＝ケイ、もし黙らなければ、あなたたちの頭骨を戦利品とし、私のベルトに誇らしく下げてやろう！」
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: 「カエ＝モラグ、モン＝ケイ、もし黙らなければ、あなたたちの頭骨を戦利品とし、私のベルトに誇らしく下げてやろう！」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Kae-morag, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich bin es, der aus Eurem Schädel eine Trophäe machen und sie stolz an meinem Gürtel tragen wird, wenn Ihr nicht Eure Zunge hütet!"
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, Chem-Pan-Sey. Ich bin es, der aus Eurem Schädel eine Trophäe machen und sie stolz an meinem Gürtel tragen wird, wenn Ihr nicht den Mund haltet!"
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Kae-morag mon-keigh. Çenene hâkim olmazsan kafatasını ganimet yapıp onu gururla kemerinde taşıyan ben olacağım."
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, mon-keigh, it is I who will make a trophy from your skull and proudly wear it on my belt if you do not hold your tongue!"
